_header: An exposition I do make here
_description: An exposition of the alchemical text, ‘Earth earthes brother’ (5095) — 66 lines in couplets

BodAsh1492.First Lines:
An exposition I do make heereWherin I charge yow secret to
                    be…
BodAsh1492.Last Lines:
…And then shall ye see come a fyreRed as bloud and full of
                    Ire
BodAsh1492.Note: Immediately followed by 5113 as if part of same work.
